name: cm_health_report.cm_recording_intervals_cm3x
description: Time intervals for which a CM3x was marked as expecting recording and recording.

metadata.comment: Unix timestamp of the start_ms of the interval. Intervals are broken up by on recording expectation and off recording expectation. See recording_expected to determine if the interval is on or off recording_expected.

Unix timestamp of the end_ms of the interval. Intervals are broken up by on recording expectation and off recording expectation. See recording_expected to determine if the interval is on or off recording_expected.
Duration of the interval in milliseconds
The duration in milliseconds the CM was connected to the VG during the interval
The unix timestamp the CM first began recording for the interval
True if the device was expected to be recording for the interval, false if the device was not expecting to be recording

The same as interval_recording_start_ms, but we potentially extend the recording duration to the start of the expected recording interval if we see recording start within 90s of the expectation/interval start
The duration in milliseconds the CM was recording to the VG during the interval
The number of times the VG rebooted during the interval
The firmware build that the VG was on during the interval
The number of times the CM rebooted during the interval
The firmware build that the CM was on during the interval
